rukus.text: By those [stars] who rise only to sit
And move [in their orbits] steadily
And float [through space] smoothly
And yet some overtake [others] swiftly
Thus they fulfill the [Creator's] purpose
On the Day when the world will shudder
Followed by a tremor
Hearts, that Day, will shiver
and eyes are humbled
They say, "Are we to be restored to the original condition
After we have turned into decayed bones
They say, "This will be a losing come back
But all it will take is a single blast
and they will be awake and above ground
Has there the story of Moses reached you
When his Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa
Go to Pharaoh. For he has transgressed
and ask him, "Would you be willing to purify yourself
And I will guide you to your Lord so you would be in awe of Him
And he showed him the greatest sign
but Pharaoh rejected the offer and disobeyed
Then he hastily turned away
and gathered [his people] and proclaimed
I am your lord, the most high
So God seized him with punishment, as an example, in the life to come as well as in this life
In this, there is a warning for whomever would fear [God]
